code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import reducers from'./reducers';var middlewares=[thunk];export function configureStore(initialState){var store=createStore(reducers,initialState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));if(module.hot){module.hot.accept('./reducers',function(){var nextRootReducer=require('./reducers');store.replaceReducer(nextRootReducer);});}return store;}
